website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a curved TV that's ideal for gaming and watching your favorite action-packed programming, this model is worth considering.
pros: Delivers a refresh rate of 240 hertz, a feature that TV enthusiasts love
65- inch screen has a slim design
Includes both 4K resolution and HDR technology that give images lifelike quality
cons: One of the pricier curved options by the brand
Sound quality isn't as nice as picture quality

website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for gamers and anyone who wants a responsive large-screen TV with amazing viewing angles.
pros: Series 8 model that includes a motion rate of 240 that's ideal for action-packed movies and sports as well as gaming
Viewing is made even better with the 4K and HDR technology on the 65-inch screen
cons: On the higher end of the price range
Sound could be a bit better

customer_reviews.title: Great TV and a great Value
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of this TV and the picture is wonderful. The 1st TV arrived with a couple of scratches on the screen, but Amazon was very helpful in getting a replacement to me, which was awesome. This TV has a lot of smart features that are really useful. I comment Samsung for a great product and Amazon for great service. I was skeptical about buying a TV from Amazon, but they made the experience great, despite the problem with the first order.
customer_reviews.author: kindleman42

customer_reviews.title: TV plus app is stalking me
customer_reviews.text: TV Plus app will play whatever it pleases to play when your TV is idle. There 's no way to delete the annoying TV plus app. I feel like I don't own this TV. Why can't I delete an annoying app if this is my tv? The built-in Game mode sucks. It makes all of my ps4 pro games (RDR2, GoW, Uncharted, etc) looks worse.
customer_reviews.author: You're synthetic

customer_reviews.title: great picture, Samsung makes a great curved TV
customer_reviews.text: Easiest to set up, great picture, Samsung makes a great curved TV. Purchased open box at a better price with full guarantee. Delivered to my door with no extra charge by Fed-X....
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: SCREEN CAME CRACKED...TOTALLY WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: SET ARRIVED WITH THE SCREEN CRACKED COMPLETELY DOWN THE MIDDLE A WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME
customer_reviews.author: Darth Siddious

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Defective product...keeps powering off!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV on March 28th and it stopped working on June 21st...too late to return it. I am now forced to deal with Samsung support, who won't acknowledge that there are serious flaws with this TV...it automatically power-cycles in increasing frequency, until it won't stay on at all. Just Google "Samsung Smart TV keeps turning off and on". I am very disappointed with this purchase and I will never buy another Samsung product!
customer_reviews.author: technoid

customer_reviews.title: Too much advertising and use collection
customer_reviews.text: I liked my 55” curved 4K Samsung so I bought this 4K 65” curved. This one is more advertising oriented. The remote is the same, no numbers on it but I ended up liking how you can use it through feel. I use an antenna and the 55” let you save your favorite stations that would show up as soon you hit the home button. This one you get advertising when you hit the home button. Rent this, rent that, no more easy to get to saved stations. You can use the voice control but you have to allow Samsung to collect information about you. The picture is just as good, just bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: No sound, opened container
customer_reviews.text: We received this TV in a package which clearly had been opened and probably previously returned. There was no sound. We had to pack it up and haul it to UPS to return it
customer_reviews.author: John Trinkwalder

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased before New Year and the price has gone a little higher. Is still a great price for what you get. The TV is wonderful. I had the 2016-2017 version that's why I bought the second one for my basement. The best deal for the buck.. The wireless works like a champ compare to any TV hands down. The only thing with Samsung is their info that they require to log in. Is kind of private and costumers are only buying a TV, they are not opening a checking account..
customer_reviews.author: erjon

customer_reviews.title: Most unintuitive setup
customer_reviews.text: Picture is reasonably good as expected. Sound is better than expected. Set up and software are the worst I have ever experienced. I wouldn't expect such bloat in a television. Unable to sign in to mystery Samsung account. Can't in good conscience recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: framitz

customer_reviews.title: Best TV ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best TV that I have ever purchased! My wife and I have agreed that this has now ruined any other TV experience. The combination of the curve and the super clear and crisp 4k image has set a new standard in our house. 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: The Daydreaming Warrior Poet

customer_reviews.title: Get insurance on tv
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this tv for 3 months and it’s already showing signs of breaking down, such as screen will go dark and come back to normal off and on
customer_reviews.author: Brent S

customer_reviews.title: A vast improvment
customer_reviews.text: My previous television was a plasma that I had for 11 years. It was a great TV, but had been showing signs of burn in and shows in black & white would show a lot of blue in the screen. This was a major upgrade. The only downside is the refresh rate. I can't expect the 600 MHz that I had with my plasma, but I still would like for my LED to not jerk during an action sequence. The sound quality is excellent and I do like the 4K screen.
customer_reviews.author: M. Musselman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tv with easy set up has a great picture and sound
customer_reviews.author: SAMKNICK

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this tv or delivery. Set up is easy and quick. I love Samsung's quality as well as the size of this television. I really enjoy a curved screen and this this tv has an excellent picture quality. It's also quite user friendly. I hope it lasts for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this TV. It works great and I like that the volume display is on the side of the screen instead of the bottom like most televisions. Also, it has plenty of sound and the picture is very clear. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Aura Castellese

customer_reviews.title: Love this curved tv
customer_reviews.text: Perfect picture, so clear you think you are there during the shoot! I would have done five stars if it had a link to Roku in the smart menu. No blind angles side to side or up and down. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: culater

customer_reviews.title: OMGoodness!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this TV!!! I’ve had it for about a month now, am still amazed at the picture quality AND sound quality. Curved screen is great - I can literally sit at my desk, which is on the same wall as TV, and I can still see the picture just fine! I bought a wall mount to swivel left, right, up or down. However, I decided not to mount it because there would be no reason to adjust - I can see from any seat in my living room or kitchen just fine! Will use mount for my old TV which I will be moving to bedroom... You can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: CSI Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good tv for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second curved screen 4K television. The last Samsung only lasted five years and we paid twice as much for it so we bought the four year warranty as well as what comes with the tv. This is a great tv for the money, cheaper than Best Buy. It arrived promptly and in good condition. It was easy to set up and has a good picture although I think our last one was better. The curved screen works best in our corner space. The sound speakers are better. We still us a sound bar though.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf quality  A great TV
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with zero damage. Easy set up. Looks great. Excellent picture. Remote is fantastic. HDMI ARC works perfectly with my Yamaha soundbar. Built in speakers are shockingly good without a soundbar. Nice job Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Biff E Waters

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and clear 3d type viewing! No glasses
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tv..... love it! And what more I am spoiled for regular televisions I am for sure buying me one for replacement on my other TV the curve gives and all around view and it adds a 3d element to your viewing... no glasses needed clear and crisp to the eye! The smart TV aspect gives for flawless transition between vudu, Netflix, WWE, hulu and other options seamless.... and even control of external speakers easy! would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: dubier

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Clarity!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this television based on the specs, but they do not do it justice!! Watching this television you feel like you're there on the screen with the actors!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Stand is inadequate
customer_reviews.text: The stand is flimsy and it cracked so l had to order another stand for an additional seventy dollars. Poor workmanship Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Item is garbage, the TV burn out after 3 months, Samsung came out replace screen for a cheaper screen. Amazon wouldn't take the return, now I'm stuck with a mirror where I see any light or anything bright in front of the TV. I will not buy another Samsung TV, and for sure will curtail my Amazon orders as I was told Amazon would help me if Samsung didn't owned up to the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Screen mark!
customer_reviews.text: Initial opening and set up. Seems to be a line going down the side of the screen. Haven’t turned it on yet. Hope it goes away Will update Update. I’ve had the tv a few hours and the screen is defective. Samsung was no help. Amazon is going to swap the product out for a replacement. I really want to love this product. The replacement comes next Tuesday. I will update then.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: TBC...
customer_reviews.text: TV showed up broken, box was not damaged so unsure how we received a broken TV. Also, bout on Black Friday and was told I’d have to pay listed price when I purchase replacement. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Freaking loving this tv. The curve display I think is a gimmic but man this thing is sexy. I actually ended up taking it off the standard stand and mounting it. Very vivid colors and man o man 65” is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mi-chan

customer_reviews.title: Glued to the TV now
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this TV! It does EVERYthing! Beautiful picture, and the sound is actually pretty good! Better than i expected! I may still get a soundbar for it, just because now I watch TV ALL the time. Feeling a little spoiled with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade TV
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set to replace a 10 year old 1080P. The difference in picture quality is amazing. Delivery was prompt and setup was not difficult (I had to purchase bolts to attach it to my current stand, but the instructions gave the necessary information about the bolts I would need, so finding the correct ones was easy. Worked fine right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Buddington

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic display for gaming, movies and even graphic design/animation
customer_reviews.text: I did a great amount of research and this particular TV is still one of the best, specially for the price. Phenomenal image, since Samsung makes the best screens on the market, fast refresh rate (120 MHz almost at par with best gaming 144 MHz displays), curved display is unique and allows for almost 0 glare, excellent price point for a quality product, 4K movies look fantastic, HDR+ Makes image quality almost on par with my $6k LG TV (seriously). If you are looking for a great tv for kids game room, PC display or man cave at a fantastic price then look no further!
customer_reviews.author: CARELINQ

customer_reviews.title: Stand broke within seconds
customer_reviews.text: The base stand broke within 2 seconds- I had to run & buy a mount as the supplied base stand will not hold the weight of the tv- Samsung should consider making the base stand sturdy enough to hold the weight. Please be very careful when placing the tv in final position after installing the stand, very bad experience and replacement stand is also not readily available locally. Thankfully we were still holding the tv and was able to save it however really scary experience.
customer_reviews.author: Samrat L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Picture is Incredible.
customer_reviews.text: For a 65" TV this takes the cake. Out of all the choices out there nothing beats the features and qualities of this gem. Plus its curved !
customer_reviews.author: Wondo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture and very fluid controls
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of the tv. The one thing I am disappointed about is that the tv description said it was 240hz which in samsungs definition means its 120hz. This is not the case. It will only do 60 hz. My xbox one x said the tv does not have more than 60hz. If I would have known this prior I would have moved on and went with one that was. Please change the description of 240hz to 120hz for this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tv!
customer_reviews.text: Man I love this tv! I’ve been wanting a new tv for several years and I finally got it. Very pleased with my purchase and I got a great deal! Several hundred dollars cheaper than the retail stores at that time. My kids get more enjoyment than I do lol
customer_reviews.author: Charlie J. France II

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Clear image but not that amazing, however it is hard to determine if I don't two different TVs to compare, I am not sure if the image quality related to cable carrier or itself? I would give 4.5 stars for the price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C

customer_reviews.title: Check check check
customer_reviews.text: Checks all the boxes for what I wanted. Great TV all around. Gaming is great with freesync and game mode. It loads apps up quickly and streams movies with no issues. The USB can play media and has plenty of HDMI ports. Oh, Bixby sucks though. Would prefer Google assistant.
customer_reviews.author: wes53177

customer_reviews.title: The Curve is the best
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the colors and resolution are lifelike. Even old black and white movies show incredibly well. The curved screen extends viewing angles beyond what a regular flat screen provides.
customer_reviews.author: P. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Best TV !
customer_reviews.text: Best TV I ever owned so far ! Picture and definition is crispy even on standard mode . Sound is not bad either for seeing how flat the tv is . Curved feature is amazing. This TV looks elegant in my living room . Kids and Wife Love it
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Singh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this tv what I wanted, it is easy to setup. It does take 2 people to unpack and place. It isn't heavy, just a little hard to handle alone. It arrived 3 days early and no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lee

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable for PC/sims/gaming
customer_reviews.text: Used exclusively for sim racing and occasional flight sim via pc I haven’t really looked much into any of the features normal people care about for a tv. However, this thing rivals the best gaming pc monitors in terms of input lag, true 1440p 120hz, plus variable refresh rates. The picture is beautiful, and for pc or gaming you absolutely cannot beat it for less than like $5,000 as of now. Don’t hesitate on this one for pc and/or gaming/sims!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Had the 2016 or 17 model for only about 1.5 yrs before it developed a screen issue. Which of course was just outside the 1 yr manufacturer warranty, and not worth cost of repair vs simply replacing. Made sure I got the extended warranty this time.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Ceglio

customer_reviews.title: Best TV to buy under $1000
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV. Good picture quality. Great for gaming. Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Maanick P.

customer_reviews.title: Price was a major factor.
customer_reviews.text: I love this television, the picture is fabulous! This TV also pushed my decision to cut the cable. The price was a big factor. The curve draws you in, and the color is mesmerizing. Again price was a major factor.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J Morin

customer_reviews.title: Tv dos not work
customer_reviews.text: The tv did not work when it got to my house
customer_reviews.author: José Jaunarena

customer_reviews.title: Glad I pulled the trigger and bought this TV
customer_reviews.text: The picture is just amazing. I have other Samsung TV's including a 43", but nothing compares to the curved view, the 4k UHD resolution. The setup was a simple process. I'd recommend the NU8500 to anyone to has both the room and money. Its a great value.
customer_reviews.author: rwaite91

customer_reviews.title: Great picture for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Samsung App store is garbage. The TV is always trying to get permission to listen to you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smart tv for our livingroom.
customer_reviews.text: We love the picture quality of this tv. It has a stylish slim design and the voice activated remote is a nice feature. The channel guide/app guide is easy to use and makes it super easy to find what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Pinkham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up everything, from sound bar, internet,.excellent picture and sound
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto S.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is the best in electronics.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy that I bought this TV. Samsung is always my choice because they provide the best in electronics. If you buy a Samsung, you will never regret.
customer_reviews.author: Imran

customer_reviews.title: What a deal
customer_reviews.text: This TV for $899 is a steal. It is last years model but doesnt feel like it. unfortunately my 2016 curved samsung died on me so i needed a quick replacement. the seller did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: 4k is good but little control over screen size, cannot expands to fill screen. Only 1.5 years and tuner just quit working. Doesn't say much for Samsung. I have sanyos over 10 years old, one a 50in, still working. Will not buy another Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mack

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I expected a huge upgrade going from 1080 and it honestly feels the same for the most part. If I didnt need a tv replacement I probably would've held out for a nicer versions price to drop. For the price it's not bad
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bever

customer_reviews.title: So glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve always had either Sony or Samsung TV’s. But Samsung has really upped their game on this one! Finally! A smart TV that you don’t need your kids to teach how to use!
customer_reviews.author: roadtrot1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Curved Screen TV
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time researching 65” curved screen then decided on this one. I very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: AK01Q

customer_reviews.title: One problem
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I've had is that the optical connector does not work properly for attaching a soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV. First time curve screen user it works excellent in my large living room everyone can see TV perfectly from any seat
customer_reviews.author: SDC

customer_reviews.title: Curved is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a full HD samsung to this 8 series 4k and im not sure the picture is that much better than my old Samsung. They are both just very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get It! You wont be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: We have a weird shaped room so the couch is close to the tv but with this the picture does not wash out. Great TV for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great television
customer_reviews.text: I already had the 55in and liked it so much I got the 65in.
customer_reviews.author: N. B. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Curved Screen Unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely no reason to purchase a curved screen. Spend $1-200 less and buy a flat one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Samsung app store doesn’t support everything. That’s the bad part. TV itself is great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Habibus Sobhan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and love picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and the curved picture quality is beautiful. You are able to puck your delivery date and time. We would definitely buy this Samsung TV again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ferryman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Great experience, easy to use, fast menus, really a smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Vitor

customer_reviews.title: Allowed me to cut the cable bill by streaming tv.
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this showed me I could cut the caable tv cord and save me a lot of money. Saved enough to pay for the tv over time.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my curved TV smart features are great picture quality is great never tried the gaming feature on it yet
customer_reviews.author: Cardel birch

customer_reviews.title: It’s super smart!
customer_reviews.text: I am having some what of a problem with the sound intermitting in and out. The sound just stop for what seem to be minuets.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great tv.
customer_reviews.text: I love the tv, the picture is very clear & awesome. Great tv.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Bolan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Most definitely the best tv ice ever had. All the apps are great. The tv works great with my Yamaha receiver & ps4 pro. The tv turns on with picture in one 1.5 seconds its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Russ P.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but great pic and sound!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clear picture and sound. A little pricey but impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Pappy

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality..
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality easy to navigate but oh boy apps suggestions every single min.. controller unresponsive some times, sound its surprisingly good
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Mendez

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have the money, this is your TV. 4k, HDR10+, the sound quality is next level. Samsung absolutely knows how to make a panel
customer_reviews.author: jeff beattie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture Quality and Easy to Use Interface
customer_reviews.text: This TV has an amazing picture and is massive. We got 2 of them and we absolutely love the picture on them.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a good investment for me I have a medium side living room, I was thinking of mounting it on the wall, however I chose a stand instead it was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: KYCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tv
customer_reviews.text: Great TV at a great price saw this tv in a local Walmart for almost $700 more.. picture is incredible and so is the audio
customer_reviews.author: Domenic ditizio

customer_reviews.title: i recommend this tv 100%
customer_reviews.text: i bought this tv in 2018, i love it, its amazing very clear good quality picture wise and clear, i always get compliments from my friends everytime they visit me, i will recomment it 100%. good staff no regret and its worth for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Glado

customer_reviews.title: Read all reviews
customer_reviews.text: For us normal humans this is a great tv. Yes you can see pic from side angles as well!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kouba

customer_reviews.title: 65 inches is a great size
customer_reviews.text: Great TV picture us beautiful it’s amazing what you can get for the price if you’re willing to go back a couple years in technology
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: The nu8500 is the best tv i have so far. It has all the features i wanted. Bluetooth was a plus for me. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY TV.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good quality stuff, but I do problem with the four screws, to hold the tv tight, if possible they could send me a longer screws. So far excellent product. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ebideigha

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful TV. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Staff09winwin

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was better
customer_reviews.text: The tv keeps flickering when using the HDMI ports. And it keeps freezing when its in standby mode
customer_reviews.author: Austin D

customer_reviews.title: Can't handle apps
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! Can't keep up with the apps that are installed. Was a major Samsung fan until this tv
customer_reviews.author: recharged

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my home and love everything about it
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Picture
customer_reviews.text: Love it . It has better sound than my other one
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Juneau

customer_reviews.title: Best choice I made with buying a big tv
customer_reviews.text: Love the tv. The motion, clearness, and the compatibility is outstanding. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: curve feature
customer_reviews.text: smart remote is nice works well with directv I mostly watch sports on this tv
customer_reviews.author: Warren M. Laschober

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets so far
customer_reviews.text: Lovely picture quality. The curve screen adds a premium look too!
customer_reviews.author: bzz

customer_reviews.title: Dead Pixels Within a Year
customer_reviews.text: Seeing dead pixels within a year of ownership. Otherwise this has been a fantastic TV. Would've preferred an android based OS but there are enough apps to keep me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy! Your family will love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a great price! You cannot best this. And it integrates well with home automation and other Samsung peripherals. True 4K for gaming. Sound bar recommended
customer_reviews.author: althea Carty

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I have really seen the difference in color, sound and picture qualities
customer_reviews.author: Kofi Ossei-Wusu

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really have enjoyed this TV.. great for gaming, watching TV, steaming movies and video. Smart features are user friendly. Easy to put together with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Came completely damaged
customer_reviews.text: This TV seems wonderful but unfortunately it was delivered to us and was extremely broke, though our box was fine
customer_reviews.author: Len Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is amazing and it was super easy to set up. The Samsung sound bar was super easy to pair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Big Red B

customer_reviews.title: 2 New TV's Failed to Turn On!
customer_reviews.text: 2 new TV's in a row Failed to Turn ON and I have had no TV for 6 weeks. A loser company not ever worth investing!
customer_reviews.author: Howdy

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment TV and Theater View In Your Home
customer_reviews.text: Everything that it is said up to be is spot on. Except sometimes during game mode the TV will restart by turning off and back on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Viegas

customer_reviews.title: Love the picture!
customer_reviews.text: Speakers do not measure up to picture... but we are still very pleased with the TV and happy we made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to hook to cable and TV prompts all the commands......very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the moment very good functionality
customer_reviews.text: All parts - XFINITY, WiFi, HDMI (Blu-Ray) and Air works very well
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Tsivinsky

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is great and love the curve tv
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research on tvs before buying and I'm very happy with this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: 240 refresh rate
customer_reviews.text: in was sold with understanding 240 refresh rate would be a better pitcher, did not happen for me
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this television. It is everything a large screen has to offer at a fair price..
customer_reviews.author: Todd Mathison

product_meta.title: Samsung Curved 65" 4K UHD 8 Series Smart LED TV (2018) - UN55NU8500FXZA
product_meta.description: Size:65-Inch| Style:TVThe feature-rich Nu8500 is equipped like its Nu8000 flat sibling, but curved for immersive viewing. Our highest Motion rate and low-lag game Mode means this TV plays as smooth as it looks.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes: One Samsung UN65NU8500FXZA Curved TV - 2018 model. One remote control with batteries, power cable and user manual.
TV dimensions without stand: 56.8" W x 32.8" H x 4.4" D. TV dimensions with stand: 56.8" W x 35.9" H x 14.9" D. TV weight: 52.5 lbs
Power required: Power Supply (V) AC110-120V 50/60Hz/. Typical Power Consumption 75/. Maximum Power Consumption 195/ Standby Power Consumption 0.3
TV is Bluetooth capable, and does not include One Connect.

See movies and shows just as the director intended in stunning high dynamic range. The Ultra Slim Array dynamically fine tunes the deepness of the blacks, to the brightness of the whites, for a picture with sensational contrast.
Discover an expanded world of colors where millions of shades HDTVs can’t replicate, with also the Motion Rate 240 which allows you to enjoy smooth, crisp action even in the fastest scenes.
